creator: Lauren Forristal
title: Google now offers free SAT practice exams, powered by Gemini
dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
content: Google now offers a way for college-bound students to take free SAT practice exams with the help of Gemini.
contentSnippet: Google now offers a way for college-bound students to take free SAT practice exams with the help of Gemini.

creator: Aisha Malik
title: Google’s AI Mode can now tap into your Gmail and Photos to provide tailored responses
dc:creator: Aisha Malik
content: The company notes that AI Mode doesn’t train directly on your Gmail inbox or Google Photos library. Instead, it trains on specific prompts and the model’s responses.
contentSnippet: The company notes that AI Mode doesn’t train directly on your Gmail inbox or Google Photos library. Instead, it trains on specific prompts and the model’s responses.

creator: Rebecca Bellan
title: Google reportedly snags team behind AI voice startup Hume AI
dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
content: Google has hired the CEO and top engineer behind voice AI startup Hume AI, signaling that voice is increasingly becoming the preferred interface over screens.
contentSnippet: Google has hired the CEO and top engineer behind voice AI startup Hume AI, signaling that voice is increasingly becoming the preferred interface over screens.

creator: Ram Iyer
title: From invisibility cloaks to AI chips: Neurophos raises $110M to build tiny optical processors for inferencing
dc:creator: Ram Iyer
content: Neurophos is taking a crack at solving the AI industry's power efficiency problem with an optical chip that uses a composite material to do the math required in AI inferencing tasks.
contentSnippet: Neurophos is taking a crack at solving the AI industry's power efficiency problem with an optical chip that uses a composite material to do the math required in AI inferencing tasks.

creator: Russell Brandom
title: Anthropic has to keep revising its technical interview test so you can’t cheat on it with Claude
dc:creator: Russell Brandom
content: The issue of AI cheating is already wreaking havoc at schools and universities around the world, so it's ironic that AI labs are having to deal with it too. But Anthropic is also uniquely well-equipped to deal with the problem.
contentSnippet: The issue of AI cheating is already wreaking havoc at schools and universities around the world, so it's ironic that AI labs are having to deal with it too. But Anthropic is also uniquely well-equipped to deal with the problem.

creator: Sarah Perez
title: Spotify brings AI-powered Prompted Playlists to the US and Canada
dc:creator: Sarah Perez
content: Now available in the US and Canada, Spotify's AI-powered Prompted Playlists let users describe what they want to hear using natural language commands.
contentSnippet: Now available in the US and Canada, Spotify's AI-powered Prompted Playlists let users describe what they want to hear using natural language commands.

creator: Jagmeet Singh
title: Quadric rides the shift from cloud AI to on-device inference — and it’s paying off
dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
content: Quadric aims to help companies and governments build programmable on-device AI chips that can run fast-changing models locally.
contentSnippet: Quadric aims to help companies and governments build programmable on-device AI chips that can run fast-changing models locally.

creator: Ivan Mehta
title: Former Google trio is building an interactive AI-powered learning app for kids
dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
content: Sparkli said that education systems often fall behind in teaching modern concepts. The company wants to teach kids about topics like skills design, financial literacy, and entrepreneurship by creating an AI-powered learning "expedition."
contentSnippet: Sparkli said that education systems often fall behind in teaching modern concepts. The company wants to teach kids about topics like skills design, financial literacy, and entrepreneurship by creating an AI-powered learning "expedition."

creator: Lucas Ropek
title: Not to be outdone by OpenAI, Apple is reportedly developing an AI wearable
dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
content: Should this wearable materialize, it could be released as early as 2027, according to a report on the device.
contentSnippet: Should this wearable materialize, it could be released as early as 2027, according to a report on the device.

creator: Marina Temkin
title: Sources: Project SGLang spins out as RadixArk with $400M valuation as inference market explodes
dc:creator: Marina Temkin
content: SGLang, which originated as an open source research project at Ion Stoica’s UC Berkeley lab, has raised capital from Accel.
contentSnippet: SGLang, which originated as an open source research project at Ion Stoica’s UC Berkeley lab, has raised capital from Accel.

creator: Rebecca Szkutak
title: A timeline of the US semiconductor market in 2025
dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
content: From leadership changes at legacy semiconductor companies to wishy washy policy around chip exports, a lot happened last year.
contentSnippet: From leadership changes at legacy semiconductor companies to wishy washy policy around chip exports, a lot happened last year.

creator: Sarah Perez
title: Todoist’s app now lets you add tasks to your to-do list by speaking to its AI
dc:creator: Sarah Perez
content: The feature, now public, lets you create to-do's and action items by speaking naturally to the app's AI.
contentSnippet: The feature, now public, lets you create to-do's and action items by speaking naturally to the app's AI.

creator: Amanda Silberling
title: Apple plans to make Siri an AI chatbot, report says
dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
content: Siri could look more like ChatGPT than its current state as an integrated feature across Apple products.
contentSnippet: Siri could look more like ChatGPT than its current state as an integrated feature across Apple products.

creator: Lucas Ropek
title: Anthropic revises Claude’s ‘Constitution,’ and hints at chatbot consciousness
dc:creator: Lucas Ropek
content: The newly revised document offers a roadmap for what Anthropic says is a safer and more helpful chatbot experience.
contentSnippet: The newly revised document offers a roadmap for what Anthropic says is a safer and more helpful chatbot experience.

creator: Julie Bort
title: Irony alert: Hallucinated citations found in papers from NeurIPS, the prestigious AI conference
dc:creator: Julie Bort
content: Research from startup GPTZero points to the impossible problem prestigious conferences face in the age of AI slop.
contentSnippet: Research from startup GPTZero points to the impossible problem prestigious conferences face in the age of AI slop.

creator: Aisha Malik
title: YouTube will soon let creators make Shorts with their own AI likeness
dc:creator: Aisha Malik
content: YouTube Shorts viewers might soon see AI versions of their favorite creators when scrolling through their feeds.
contentSnippet: YouTube Shorts viewers might soon see AI versions of their favorite creators when scrolling through their feeds.

creator: Ivan Mehta
title: OpenAI aims to ship its first device in 2026, and it could be earbuds
dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
content: The AI startup is on track to announce its first hardware device in the second half of this year, OpenAI Chief Global Affairs Officer Chris Lehane said during an interview at Davos.
contentSnippet: The AI startup is on track to announce its first hardware device in the second half of this year, OpenAI Chief Global Affairs Officer Chris Lehane said during an interview at Davos.

creator: TechCrunch Events
title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets now on sale: Lowest rates all year
dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
content: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets are officially on sale. Save up to $680 on your ticket and be among the first 500 registrants to score a plus-one pass at 50% off. Don't miss 10,000 tech leaders, founders, and VCs in San Francisco from October 13-15. Register before these one-time deals vanish.
contentSnippet: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 tickets are officially on sale. Save up to $680 on your ticket and be among the first 500 registrants to score a plus-one pass at 50% off. Don't miss 10,000 tech leaders, founders, and VCs in San Francisco from October 13-15. Register before these one-time deals vanish.

creator: Ivan Mehta
title: Adobe Acrobat now lets you edit files using prompts, generate podcast summaries
dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
content: Adobe is adding AI tools to Acrobat, including the ability to generate podcast summaries of files, create presentations, and a way for users to edit files using prompts.
contentSnippet: Adobe is adding AI tools to Acrobat, including the ability to generate podcast summaries of files, create presentations, and a way for users to edit files using prompts.

creator: Tim De Chant
title: Zanskar thinks 1 TW of geothermal power is being overlooked
dc:creator: Tim De Chant
content: Zanskar has raised $115 million to find about a dozen geothermal resources that could help power the grid throughout the U.S. West.
contentSnippet: Zanskar has raised $115 million to find about a dozen geothermal resources that could help power the grid throughout the U.S. West.
